transcript:
Customer: Hello? Hello?
Executive: Good morning sir, main Pawan Textile company mein ho rahi hai Pawan Arya ji se?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir Nidhi bol rahi thi IndiaMART ke headquarter se, sir aapka isse concern aaya tha aapne customer care pe call ki thi.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji, toh aap mujhe batayenge sir kya problem aa rahi hai?
Customer: Mam woh problem yeh thi ke jo IndiaMART hum log kal na woh apne aap na block ho gaya tha kya ho gaya tha woh chal nahi raha tha fir maine woh kaat ke na fir se reload kara.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Theek hai, uske baad bhi on nahi ho raha tha.
Executive: Okay, theek hai na error dikha raha tha.
Customer: Okay, ab theek chal raha hai?
Executive: Haan haan ho gaya, ji ji subah hua tha.
Executive: Theek hai, plus abhi mujhe ek cheez batayenge aap sir jaise abhi jo aapki company chal rahi hai isme abhi buyers ke kya responses aa rahe hain and buyleads wagera kaise aa rahi hai aapke paas?
Customer: Mam buyleads toh aap yeh samjhe ke koi khas khas woh response nahi aa raha koi lead aapke proper kayde se aa rahi nahi hai.
Executive: Okay, matlab leads aapke according location mein issue aa raha hai sir ya buyer ke responses mein aa rahe hain?
Customer: Mam buyer ke responses.
Executive: Buyer ke responses mein aa rahe hain, okay, sir majorly abhi jaise maine aapko pura profile check kara toh hum log school uniforms mein deal kar rahe hain right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Toh abhi sir jaise abhi aapka winter ka time chal raha hai toh mostly aap jo sweaters wagera hote hain school kids ke aur fir aapke jo blazers wagera hote hain usme deal kar rahe honge right?
Customer: Blazer.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji, toh abhi iske buyer aapko mil rahe hain ya sir ki nahi mil rahe hain?
Customer: Abhi mam koi nahi mil raha, abhi toh koi mere paas lagbhag dedh do mahine se koi lead generate nahi hui hai.
Executive: Okay, sir services toh personally aap hi handle karte hain ya koi aur member bhi hamara handle karta hai?
Customer: Main handle karta hu mam.
Executive: Theek hai, abhi aapke paas 10-15 minute ka time hoga sir ek chhoti si video meeting schedule karni thi aapke saath?
Customer: Mam main ek school mein baitha hu main.
Executive: Achha aap abhi school mein ho, okay okay not an issue, toh kab tak free ho jayenge aap kuch time denge mujhe?
Customer: Main lagbhag haan lagbhag aap maan le ke aadhe ghante mein ho jaunga main.
Executive: Aadhe ghante mein ho jayenge, theek hai, sir ek cheez hame confirm honi thi aise abhi whatsapp number aap ek baar hame bata dijiye toh main aapko na mere sath whatsapp pe connect kar leti hu toh jaise hi aap free ho jaoge.
Customer: Aap likh le.
Executive: Haan bataiye sir.
Customer: 925811
Executive: 925811
Customer: 7911
Executive: 7911, okay aapka naam Pawan hai right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ek second sir.

Executive: Okay, main aapko ek na whatsapp pe message initiate kara hai high ka, theek hai, plus main aapko ek by default message mera initiate kar rahi hu aap mujhe same number pe connect kar lijiyega ya fir mera main official number bhi aapko share kar rahi hu, theek hai, ek 10-15 minute ka mujhe aapka time chahiye hoga video meeting ke through kyunki kuch products hain unki na categories aapke saath confirm karni thi mujhe.
Customer: Okay mam.
Executive: Theek hai plus main just ko tab tak whatsapp kar de rahi hu and sir abhi ek do minute baat ho sakti hai aapse if you don't mind?
Customer: Ji ji koi nahi bataye aap.
Executive: Okay, sir hum log school uniforms mein jo deal kar rahe hain toh particularly hum log kya expect kar le ke kitna order quantity hona chahiye?
Customer: Order aapko main bata du ke hamare paas na jitni quantity chahiye na bande ko utni mil jayegi lekin kam se kam 50 hone chahiye.
Executive: Kam se kam 50 pieces hone chahiye aapke right?
Customer: Haan ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai and sir hamara location ka koi hai like hum log limitation hai ki hum log UP mein Aligarh UP se hain toh hum log kisi ek particular location pe deal kar sakte hain?
Customer: Nahi all India mam.
Executive: All India.
Customer: Nahi nahi all India deal hai ji.
Executive: Theek hai all India mein aapke paas 50 pieces minimum requirement hai right?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai and sir aapka ek yaha pe product hai inactive hai jaise aapka school blazer fabrics.
Customer: Ji, woh fabric hi deal nahi karte hum log.
Executive: Toh abhi aap deal nahi kar rahe ho, theek hai.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Yeh aapka remove ho jayega.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir, theek hai fir main aapko na thodi der mein aap jab free ho jayenge mujhe same number pe connect kar lijiyega.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Same aapke saath video meeting pe discuss kar lenge plus main aapko kuch screenshot bhej rahi hu like pan India level pe kuch like filters wagera apply karke main aapko kuch leads bhej rahi hu ki jo aapke liye suitable honge, theek hai order value aapka sir.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Sir value aap minimum kitna expect kar rahe ho?
Customer: Mam value toh aap yeh samjhe ke kitni bhi ho quantity 50 se kam na ho.
Executive: Theek hai, main abhi aap aaj se teen ghante pehle Muzaffarnagar Uttar Pradesh ke ek buyer hain, unhone kids woolen aur jaise ki abhi woolen mein hai toh yeh cheez mujhe aap se ek baar confirm karna hoga ki hai toh school uniform hi aapka consider ho raha hai yaha par.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai toh theek hai main aapko us time pe karti hu baki main kuch screenshot share karti hu toh fir hum log video meeting mein is cheez ke through discuss kar lenge.
Customer: Okay mam.
Executive: Okay, thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Account was blocked, now resolved.

- Not receiving proper buyleads.

- No leads generated in the last 1.5-2 months.

- School blazer fabrics product is inactive.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the account issue is resolved.

- Will connect on WhatsApp for a video meeting.

- Will share screenshots of potential leads.

- Agreed to remove the inactive product.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect on WhatsApp after 30 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, school uniforms, product removal, video meeting
